title: FS: N172 Keenan Viau Cincinnati Lot $350.00

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Keenan Viau Cincinnati Lot $350.00
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone just recently picked these two cards up from fellow board members but need to raise funds for other old judge cards.  I am asking 350.00 for the pair which is what I have in them.   Please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] if interested.  Thanks for your time
William
